posts.post_content:
I have 3 of the 13 Charlotte cards from the T209 Contentnea set and need the 10 below to complete the Charlotte team set.

(I grew up in Charlotte attending minor league games and collect Charlotte minor league baseball memorabilia, especially cards).

Willing to accept any condition. 

1910 T209 Contentnea Charlotte Want List

Thank you,

Brett

posts.post_title: UPDATE: T209 Contentnea Charlotte cards (want list)
posts.post_content:
Thanks to everyone who responded I was able to get a few cards. 

Now, I have 6 of the 13 Charlotte cards from the T209 Contentnea set and need the 7 below to complete the Charlotte team set.

(I grew up in Charlotte attending minor league games and collect Charlotte minor league baseball memorabilia, especially cards).

Again, willing to accept any condition.
